There were some network trouble from time to time, so the workspace could not be
saved at least once. ... but how can such lead to a CCEx?!?
How can I fix it?

This is likely due to corrupted metadata. The class cast exception occurs due to
an object of a non-expected class being found when reading from the serialized
state.

Looks like a dup of bug 35824 (workspace also on network location).

As a work-around, try deleting (or moving) the offending file. Should work.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 35824 ***
